cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.

switchPlans.question: Can I switch between plans?
switchPlans.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings. Changes will apply at your next billing cycle.

refundPolicy.question: What is the refund policy?
refundPolicy.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.

groupDiscount.question: Do you offer team discounts?
groupDiscount.answer: Yes! We offer special pricing for teams of 5 or more members. Contact our sales team for more details.
